direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods create error responses with specific error codes and optional reason phrases.
Both methods create error responses for different types of requests (allocation vs. create permission) but with similar error handling.
Both methods create error responses for different types of requests (refresh vs. create permission) but with similar error handling.

enhanced_by.reason: The setup for creating a permission error response often involves a preceding create permission request.
The method to create a permission response can be invoked before or after creating an error response to test different scenarios.
Both methods handle similar exceptions and can be used to verify error responses.
